gantrytips.tip: The Background picker allow you to select a background image for your main page background.
Main colors configuration panel. This allows you to configure color and overlay settings for the main background area of the template.
Page colors configuration panel. This allows you to configure color and overlay settings for the page surround and main content areas of the template.
Showcase colors configuration panel. This allows you to configure color and overlay settings for the header and showcase areas of the template.
Primary colors configuration panel. This allows you to configure color and overlay settings for the primary and accent colors used throughout the template.
Bottom colors configuration panel. This allows you to configure color and overlay settings for the copyright areas of the template.
The Read More Style setting allows you to select an available style type for the display of read more links in the template.
Enable or disable the page loading transition animation effects.

This setting allows you to use 3rd party WebFonts from providers such as Google. You must first set WebFonts to show and then save your changes, then the available WebFonts will appear in the Font Settings dropdown from where they can be selected.
A selection of fonts to be applied to your site's frontend is available from the Font Settings dropdown. It is also possible to set the Font Size according to your preference.
